Math Class

It is almost compatible with JavaScript's Math.

Implemented methods:
abs (Get absolute value)
acos (Arc cosine)
asin (Arc sine)
atan (Arc tangent)
atan2 (Arc tangent of two variables)
ceil (Round up)
floor (Round down)
exp (e to the nth power)
log (Natural logarithm)
max (The larger of two values)
min (The smaller of two values)
random (Random number from 0 to less than 1)
pow (Exponentiation)
round (Rounding to an integer)
sin (Sine)
cos (Cosine)
tan (Tangent)
sqrt (Square root)

Implemented properties:
E (e)
LN10 (log(10))
LN2 (log(2))
LOG10E (Logarithm of e to base 10)
LOG2E (Logarithm of e to base 2)
PI (π)
SQRT1_2 (sqrt(1/2))
SQRT2 (sqrt(2))
